application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1	False Acacia (Robinia pseudoacacia)	Crown Lift to provide 6m clearance from ground level. Final height and spread as existing and ensure 2m clearance from buildings.T2	False Acacia (Robinia pseudoacacia)	Prune to give 2m clearance from buildings. Final height and spread remain as existing.T3-5	Maple (Acer)	Repollard. Final height = 4m and final spread = 3m.T6-T10	London plane (Platanus x hispanica)	Repollard. Final height = 5m and final spread = 4m.T11	Judas Tree (Cercis siliquastrum)	Prune back from porchway. Final height and spread remain as existing.T12	Judas Tree (Cercis siliquastrum)	Prune back from light. Final height and spread remain as existing.T13	Purple Leafed Plum (Prunus cerasifera 'Pissardii')	Crown lift by 0.5m. Final height and spread remain as existing.T14-T15	Veriegated Maple (Acer leopoldii varigatum)	Remove reversion in leaf . Final height and spread remain as existing.	T16-T18	Willow x 3 by river	Reduce / Remove regrowth. Final height = 5m and final spread = 4m.	T20	Elder (Sambucus nigra)	Fell to ground level, remove all arisings and grind / grub out stump with a view to replace with suggested options given.
